content.name: PyMUD
content.description: A framework for building a type of text-based game known as a multi-user dungeon. Leverages multithreading for handling client connections and server events. Built with Python; uses Docker and PostgreSQL in development.

content.name: Powerball
content.description: CLI application that crunches Powerball draws to determine the most likely next draw. This works by calculating the probabilities for an assumedly random distribution; it returns the numbers with the highest associated probabilities.
